page.title: 02BRIMINGTON
page.content: Brimington is in Derbyshire.It is a small place.It has got four churches.There are quite a few schools.Brimington is very easy to find.It is surrounded by towns like Whittington Moor.It has a very sad place,the Crematorium and Cemetery.In Brimington there are five pubs.The four schools in Brimington are Lower Westwood,Upper Westwood,Henry Bradley and Brimington Junior School.The people in Brimington are very friendly.We have very good transport in Brimington.We have a library in Brimington which has a lot of books. There are three parks in the area, they are perfect for taking dogs for a walk.Brimington is situated on the{North East Derbyshire Coalfields.} Brimington is mentioned in the original Domesday Book of 1086.
